DOC.brief_summary: This study was conducted to determine the safety, tolerance, pharmacokinetics and antiviral activity of val-mCyd at doses ranging from 50 mg to 800 mg per day.
DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety and Antiviral Activity of Val-mCyd in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Documented clinical history of chronic hepatitis C and compensated liver disease No antiviral treatment for hepatitis C in the 6 months prior to the Screening visit Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Patient is pregnant or breastfeeding Patient is coinfected with HBV or HIV Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
